Articles.Content:
I'm capturing the onCrewOnEva event, and while it works, when the event is called, the kerbal name is not yet set in the part.partInfo.title.  This is bad, since I need to do something based on which kerbal it is.

The title is set properly when the onCrewBoardVessel is called.

Is this a bug, or a quirk, and, if a quirk, is there anyway around it?

 

And, before anyone suggests it, the name is either kerbalEVA or kerbalEVAfemale

Edited June 2, 2017 by linuxgurugamer

And the answer is:

The part.name contains the kerbal name, inside parentheses, so using the Split method, it's easy to get.

 

 

Edited June 2, 2017 by linuxgurugamer
I've been able to get the name of the kerbal from vessel.vesselName (albeit I'm doing it much later, not immediately upon onCrewOnEva, so YMMV)
GameEvents.OnCrewTransferred fires immediately after OnCrewOnEva and contains the PCM
